alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 02 at 1:34PM PDT until April 03 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT MONDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 1500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills. In Washington, South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
